zBuilder.data.maps.interpolateValues(sourceMeshName, destinationMeshName, wList)[source]¶
Description:
Will transfer values between similar meshes with differing topology. Lerps values from triangleIndex of closest point on mesh.
Accepts:
sourceMeshName, destinationMeshName - strings for each mesh transform

Returns:

zBuilder.data.maps.replace_longname(search, replace, longName)[source]¶

does a search and replace on a long name. It splits it up by (‘|’) then performs it on each piece

Parameters:
  • search (str) – search term
  • replace (str) – replace term
  • longName (str) – the long name to perform action on
Returns:

result of search and replace
Return type:

str
